body: HB makes it super easy to vary window size by orientation. Is there a way to apply glazing materials by orientation? I've tried a few different paths and it's not looking promising. Any help would be much appreciated!

replies.body:
Hi Ernst,



This is a very good suggestion and we already have it on the list of wishes to be implemented soon:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/449](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/449)



Mostapha
Great. It definitely seems more critical to have window materials (EP & Radiance) combined with glazing ratios than to have skylights in the same component. Thanks.
